name: vlider
description: Simple to use, highly customizable, and pretty vue js range slider

scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/vlider.umd.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/vlider.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/vlider.min.js

author: Kawish Behzad (http://kawisphoenix.me)
